featured.text: The amazing adventures of Superman, Peter Pan, and Harry Potter have charmed many people, children and adults alike.
Decorative or sticker bindis come in all sizes, colors and variations, and can be worn by young and old, married and unmarried people alike.
Wildlife encounters are unforgettable experiences for children and adults alike.

definition.en_def: Having a resemblance or similarity to something else.
definition.example: The twins look so alike that it's hard to tell them apart.
